text: aur (jis vakt nooh ka beta garak (doob) ho raha tha to nooh ne apane paravaradigaar ko pukaara aur arz kee ai mere paravaradigaar isamen to shaq nahin ki mera beta mere ahal (ghar vaalon) mein shaamil hai aur toone vaayada kiya tha ki tere ahal ko bacha loonga) aur isamen shaq nahin ki tera vaayada sachcha hai aur too saare (jahaan) ke haakimon se bada haakim hai
